body.name: JXQTLINGMU Farmhouse Storage Cabinet, 5 Shelf Bookshelf, Bookcase, Pantry Cabinet, Versatile Storage Cabinet with Doors and Adjustable Shelves for Living Room, Bedroom, Kitchen (White)
features: Classical farmhouse Design: This farmhouse bookcase will add a touch of rustic elegance to your living room. Its charming vintage design and sleek finish make it a perfect addition to any modern or traditional decor.

​5-Tier Storage Cabinet: The 3-tier display cabinet above is for displaying your books, collectibles, decorations, and more. The 2-tier Invisibility Cabinet below facilitates the organization of gadgets or any other items you wish to store.

Customize Your Room: All the shelves are adjustable. The adjustable shelves provide enough flexibility to accommodate items of different sizes, allowing you to customize the cabinet room to your needs, meeting all of your storage needs.

Versatile Storage: This farmhouse storage cabinet is designed to provide ample storage space for a variety of items. With 5 shelves and adjustable shelves, you can easily organize and store books, pantry items, kitchen essentials, and more.

Package & Delivery: The product will be shipped in batches in sturdy boxes surrounded by thick foam and wooden protective panels to provide maximum protection from damage during shipping. The package comes with a product manual with clear, step-by-step instructions. Feel free to contact the service team if you have any issues or concerns during the installation process.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Multifunctional Storage Cabinet with Barn Door & Adjustable Shelves Living Room: This bookshelf is a perfect storage and display solution that adds a touch of elegance and charm to your living room. You can place books, artwork, or other decor items on the shelves to create a neater and more organized living space.Office: The Farmhouse 5-Tier Bookshelf provides additional storage space for your office. You can organize files and store office supplies, helping to keep your workspace tidy and efficient, leading to increased productivity.Kitchen: This pantry organizer and storage can also be used as a practical storage cabinet for storing utensils, kitchenware, and food items. The barn door design allows for easy access to the items you need.Bathroom: The sturdy construction of this linen cabinet makes it suitable for bathroom environments. You can use it to organize towels, toiletries, and other bathroom essentials. In conclusion, the "JXQTLINGMU Farmhouse 5-Tier Bookshelf" is a versatile and practical piece of furniture with its strong storage capacity, chic farmhouse style, adjustable shelves, and barn door design. Whether it's for storing books, displaying decor items, or organizing everyday essentials, this storage cabinet excels in functionality. It brings order and comfort to your space, offering a valuable addition to any living room, office, kitchen, or bathroom setting.
Adjustable Shelves Special Edge Craft Roman Column Handle Strong Hinge

JXQTLINGMU Farmhouse Office Furniture Series Cubby Bookshelf Executive Desk File Cabinet STORAGE CAPACITY 3 Open Shelves and Barn Door STORAGE CAPACITY 5 Drawers and a Cabinet STORAGE CAPACITY 2 Drawers Cabinet DIMENSIONS 15.4"D x 31.5"W x 70"H DIMENSIONS 22"D x 58"W x 30"H DIMENSIONS 20"D x 30"W x 30"H

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice cabinet, great customer service
reviews.reviewText: The cabinet looks great put together and there is a lot of storage. I am very happy with the design. Unfortunately, there was some damage during shipping, but I reached out to the company and they were very helpful at resolving the issue. I would buy again from this seller.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Ridiculous Amount of Damage!!
reviews.reviewText: DO NOT ORDER THIS ITEM!! They did not nail/screw in any pieces correctly and the entire inside is damaged. Screws sticking out in 8 places on each individual side panel to the point where the entire cabinet has shards of wood popping out. Tried to return and they are saying I have to pay for shipping when it’s their fault!! It would crack and collapse if I tried to assemble it and displayed ANYTHING on it! So furious!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great customer service
reviews.reviewText: I purchased two of the sellers side tables, one big and one small and this cabinet. The cabinet unfortunately arrived damaged due to FedEx handling but I contacted the seller and they promptly provided options and sent us a new cabinet and did not ask us to pay for shipping or return the damaged. Easy to put together with a drill. Overall great quality for the price. Would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice for the price
reviews.reviewText: This is an inexpensive cabinet which works well for my use. Assembly was fairly easy although two people are needed. There was one chip on the partial board but luckily it is not visible. If small children are in the house, I would recommend anchoring to the wall as it is not real stable. However, that is not an issue for me. I think it is a very cute and am happy with the way it looks!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Super easy to assemble if you have a 2nd person to hold the pieces while you assemble. It will seem unstable at first, but once completed it is pretty solid. I love the soft-close doors and the way the backing is made (nicer finished look than most similar furniture). I plan to purchase a second one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The shelf looks great and matches very well. Sturdy with plenty of room. Thanks

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Spend your money elsewhere
reviews.reviewText: Pieces had cracks right out of the box. The whole thing is literally held together with only cam locks. Not expecting it to hold up. Only reason I'm giving it 3 stars instead of 2 or 1 is because it is very nice looking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Seller never made contact in making things right
reviews.reviewText: Product came as described but it came damaged in more than one place and when I reached out to seller they never responded to make things right. Sturdy and already put together my husband used all the “boo boo” bandaids to cover up the damage, though even that looks quite stupid. Wouldn’t recommend purchasing again from this seller. This was an expensive product too- who wants damaged goods!?
